blocks.name: block1

history.name: block1
history.html:
Contribute

You can contribute to RedKite CMS at GitHub where you can find the source code.

Open an issue if you find a wrong behaviour or to ask for new features.

Help us to improve the code sending us your pull requests!

We love to get contributions from you!
